name: KEYBOXE
description:
Welcome to KEYBOXE Gaston Baston

Get ready for an intergalactic typing showdown in this fast-paced space-themed game. Put your typing skills to the test as you face off against opponents from across the universe, each with their own unique challenges.

Your goal is to push your opponent out of bounds while also staying rooted yourself, requiring quick and accurate typing. With each victory, you'll unlock new levels and opponents, each offering greater challenges and excitement.

Whether you're a seasoned typist or just looking for a fun new challenge, KEYBOXE Gaston Baston offers an unforgettable gaming experience for players of all skill levels. So, get ready to become the Root Master of the Universe!

Global Game Jam 2023 game made with :

https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/keyboxe-gaston-baston-4

Samuel Charlet (Dev) : https://samuelcharlet.itch.io/
Jeremy Van Den Burg (GD) : https://jeremy-van-den-burg.itch.io/
Marius Fontaine (GD) : https://mariusftn.itch.io/
Etienne Javelle (Dev + DA) : https://etiennejavelle.itch.io/
